A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Really fun movie. Nice blend of new and old characters. Doesn't take itself too seriously and is all the better for it. Looks fantastic\, great music and some great set pieces.\n\nAll the boys complaining about how the movie is promoting \"feminazi\"\, \"leftist\" \"liberal\" etc are a joke. Somehow it is ok to beloved that the\"force\" is real but are unable to believe that women may be leaders in a rebellion lol. I am a life long fan/nerd but it is just a movie.
